H0.text: Which acid has the alternative name ‘spirits of salt’. Hydrochloric Acid

H1.text: Which acid has the alternative name ‘spirits of salt’. Sulfuric Acid

H2.text: Which acid has the alternative name ‘spirits of salt’. Acetic Acid

H3.text: Which acid has the alternative name ‘spirits of salt’. E507

A4.text: hydrochloric acid was historically called by European alchemists spirits of salt or acidum salis (salt acid)

A5.text: Hydrochloric acid, also known as muriatic acid or spirits of salt, is an aqueous solution of hydrogen chloride (HCl)
